W

Wheel - Class in hw2
This class encapsulates information about the state of the wheel for a wheel of fortune game.
Wheel() - Constructor for class hw2.Wheel
Constructs a new game wheel with an initial rotation of 359 degrees.
WHEEL_FILENAME - Static variable in class gui.GameUI
Name of image for wheel.
WheelCanvas - Class in gui
Custom panel for animating the spinning of the wheel.
WheelCanvas(GameUI, Game) - Constructor for class gui.WheelCanvas
Constructs the panel and loads the image.
wheelReady() - Method in class gui.GameUI
Callback for the wheel to notify the UI when the spinning animation is finished.
whoseTurn() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the 0-based index of the player whose turn it is.
winRound() - Method in class hw2.Player
Adds the player's round balance to the game balance (without modifying the round balance).
